summary: An inheritance leads a young man and his friends to an abandoned resort inhabited by two sketchy caretakers and a clan of mutant cannibals.
cast: Anthony Ilott|Chris Jarvis|Aqueela Zoll|Sadie Katz|Rollo Skinner|Billy Ashworth|Harry Belcher|Joe Gaminara|Roxanne Carrion|Radoslav Parvanov|Danko Jordanov|Asen Asenov|Kicker Robinson|Talitha Luke-Eardley|Luke Cousins|Josie Kidd|Venetka Georgieva
title: Camino sangriento 6
